short_description: family fitness center is a gyms, fitness & health center based in walker, michigan, united states.
long_description: family fitness center locations offer large cardiovascular training areas with treadmills, cross trainers, elliptical trainers, stair climbers, recumbent bikes, upright bikes, and cardiovascular entertainment. family fitness centers offer a wide variety of group fitness classes offered at our locations across west michigan in grand rapids (walker & westside), sparta, norton shores, and north muskegon. our main workout floors are loaded with selectorized machines, circuit training machines, plate load machines, iso-lateral machines, functional training equipment and tone and tones of free weights. get started accomplishing your health & fitness goals. family fitness centers has 6 west michigan locations offering cardiovascular machines, strength training equipment, group exercise classes, personal training, tanning, *childcare, and much more.
